SummaryEnglish: In a society that favors good looks, a high school outcast leads a double life switching between his two bodies that are polar opposites in appearance.
SummaryJapanese:
ある日目覚めると、完璧な顔とボディの超絶イケメンになっていた！？ 

アニメーションシリーズ「外見至上主義」も、原作漫画と同様に現代社会を生きる人々の機微である外見至上主義、物質万能主義に対する問題意識を起点にストーリーが展開されています。

 主人公のPark Hyung Sukが多様な出会いや葛藤を乗り越え、夢を叶えていく成長ストーリーをお楽しみに。

1.SummaryEnglish: After enduring years of abuse from his peers, Park Hyeong-seok moves to a different neighborhood to start a new life. Big changes are coming for him.

2.SummaryEnglish: Hyeong-seok attends school in his new body by day and works a part-time job as his true self by night – only to learn that nothing has really changed.

3.SummaryEnglish: A student by the nickname Basco helps the old Hyeong-seok fight off bullies, while the new Hyeong-seok hangs out with his first-ever group of friends.

4.SummaryEnglish: Hyeong-seok takes his mother out to a cafe as his transformed self. Basco seethes with righteous indignation when he spots the two together.

5.SummaryEnglish: Hyeong-seok lends a hand to other struggling peers in school, while an enigmatic classmate offers him help and gifts when he needs it most.

6.SummaryEnglish: Pyeon Deok-hwa considers performing at the school festival, while others in his class relentlessly try to trample on his dream of becoming a rap artist.

7.SummaryEnglish: Under Deok-hwa’s direction, Hyeong-seok unlocks his singing potential as their musical collaboration nurtures their blossoming friendship.

8.SummaryEnglish: Competition heats up backstage on the day of the festival. Hyeong-seok and Deok-hwa leave their past and fears behind to deliver a song from the heart.
